Class Konsol

java.lang.Object
  Konsol

public class Konsol
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a javascool panel which allows to experiment the konsoltomic search. Static method import: 

 import static Konsol.echo;
 import static Konsol.readString;
 import static Konsol.readInteger;
 import static Konsol.readFloat;
Documentation: subject and correction.
